title: Create Smart Study Planner AI with schedule generation and progress tracking

requirements.text: Create a clean homepage with a title displaying 'Smart Study Planner AI', a tagline describing the AI-powered study planning functionality, and a navigation bar for site sections

quotes: A clean homepage with a title, tagline, and navigation bar

acceptanceCriteria: Homepage displays 'Smart Study Planner AI' as the main title
Tagline clearly describes the AI study planning purpose
Navigation bar is present and functional

requirements.text: Create an input form where students can enter: subjects (multiple), exam date for each subject, daily available study hours, and difficulty level for each subject

quotes: A form where students can enter: Subjects, Exam date, Daily available study hours, Difficulty level of each subject

acceptanceCriteria: Form accepts multiple subjects with individual exam dates
Daily available study hours input is present
Difficulty level selector is available for each subject
Form validates all required fields before submission

requirements.text: Implement an AI-based study schedule generator that automatically divides subjects based on priority and exam date, generates daily study tasks, and suggests revision days

quotes: An AI-based study schedule generator that: Automatically divides subjects based on priority and exam date, Gives daily tasks, Suggests revision days

acceptanceCriteria: Algorithm prioritizes subjects based on exam proximity and difficulty level
Daily study tasks are generated based on available study hours
Revision days are strategically placed before exam dates
Schedule adapts to the number of days until each exam

requirements.text: Create a progress tracker that displays percentage completion for the overall study plan and individual subjects

quotes: A progress tracker with percentage completion

acceptanceCriteria: Progress tracker shows overall completion percentage
Individual subject progress is tracked and displayed
Progress updates as tasks are marked complete
Visual representation (progress bar or similar) is clear and intuitive

requirements.text: Add a motivational quote section that displays student-focused motivational quotes
acceptanceCriteria: Motivational quotes are displayed in a dedicated section
Quotes are relevant to studying and student motivation
Quote section is visually distinct and appealing

requirements.text: Design the application with a beautiful, student-friendly aesthetic using soft colors throughout the interface

quotes: A beautiful, student-friendly design with soft colors

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses soft, non-harsh colors suitable for extended viewing
Design is clean, modern, and appealing to students
Visual hierarchy guides users naturally through the interface
Typography is readable and professional

requirements.text: Ensure the entire application is fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices, tablets, and desktop screens
acceptanceCriteria: Layout adapts seamlessly to mobile, tablet, and desktop screen sizes
All interactive elements are touch-friendly on mobile devices
Text remains readable at all breakpoints
Navigation is accessible on all device sizes

requirements.text: Apply a cohesive visual theme with a warm, educational aesthetic using soft pastels or earth tones, rounded corners, gentle shadows, and calming typography that creates a focused, stress-free study environment
acceptanceCriteria: Visual theme is consistently applied across all pages and components
Color scheme evokes calm and focus appropriate for a study tool
Design elements support usability without distraction

constraints: Backend must use Motoko within a single-actor architecture
Frontend must use React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and React Query
Do not modify immutable paths: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui
nonGoals: Integration with external AI services like OpenAI or Anthropic

required: Hero background image with soft gradient and subtle study-related icons or patterns suitable for education (hero-bg.dim_1920x1080.png)
Brain or lightbulb icon representing AI intelligence in a minimal, friendly style (ai-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Calendar icon for exam date scheduling in soft colors (calendar-icon.dim_128x128.png)
Progress chart or checkmark icon for the progress tracker (progress-icon.dim_128x128.png)
